ctx: intros f g x H1 H2.
intros f g x H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment f, g : R -> R x : R H1 : forall x : R, f x = g x H2 : continuity_pt f x Unable to unify "f ?M2368 = g ?M2368" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : R_UniformSpace, ball x eps y -> (fun x : R_UniformSpace => f x = g x) y".

original: intros f g x H1 H2. apply continuity_pt_ext_loc with (f := f) (x := x). intros x0. apply H1. apply H2.
